value.title: Airlines turn to facial recognition technology ahead of holiday rush
value.excerpt: The travel industry is gearing up for what could be its since the coronavirus pandemic began, and at least one U.S. airline is aiming to make things easier and faster.

value.title: Google Tensor gets crushed by Apple A15 in machine learning despite being a ML-centric chip
value.excerpt: The Google Tensor processor is supposed be all about machine learning but it got crushed by the Apple A15 Bionic in the Geekbench ML app.

value.title: Microsoft Azure and Google Cloud results soar as the world goes digital
value.excerpt: Microsoft Cloud generated $20.7 billion in revenue for Q3 2021, which is an year on year increase of 36%, driven by a 50% growth in Azure and other cloud services revenue. Similarly, Google Cloud revenues neared $5 billion thanks to a 45% jump,

value.title: One Drop Delivers Novel AI-Powered Solution For Cardiovascular Disease Prevention
value.excerpt: One Drop, a leader in precision health solutions for people living with chronic conditions worldwide, today announced the release of a digital, AI-enabled cardiovascular disease (CVD) prevention module.

value.title: Computer vision platform Cogniac nabs $20M to bolster its customer acquisition efforts
value.excerpt: Cogniac, a startup developing computer vision technology primarily for industrial and manufacturing companies, raised $20 million in capital.

value.title: Nvidia GeForce RTX 3070 vs. AMD Radeon RX 6800: Which GPU should you buy?
value.excerpt: We compare Nvidia's GeForce RTX 3070 and AMD's Radeon RX 6800 across a wide range of metrics. Performance matters—but the price may matter even more.

value.title: Microsoft powers transformation at NVIDIA GTC Fall—GPU technology conference
value.excerpt: This year during NVIDIA GTC 21, we’re spotlighting some of the most transformational applications powered by NVIDIA accelerated computing that highlights our commitment to edge, on-premises, and cloud computing. Registration is free, so sign up to learn how Microsoft is powering transformation.

value.title: Report: 81% of online retailers increase AI budget to boost holiday sales
value.excerpt: AI is becoming an essential tool in ecommerce, used to enable targeted campaigns and improve supply chain management.

value.title: Nightly News Full Broadcast (October 26th)
value.excerpt: FDA panel recommends Pfizer’s Covid vaccine for kids ages 5 to 11, powerful nor’easter hits East Coast, and how facial recognition will change the way you travel.

value.title: Train models faster with an automated data profiler for Amazon Fraud Detector
value.excerpt: Amazon Fraud Detector is a fully managed service that makes it easy to identify potentially fraudulent online activities, such as the creation of fake accounts or online payment fraud. Amazon Fraud Detector uses machine learning (ML) under the hood and is based on over 20 years of fraud detection expertise

value.title: Machine learning reveals brain networks involved in child aggression
value.excerpt: Child psychiatric disorders, such as oppositional defiant disorder and attention-deficit/hyperactivity disorder (ADHD), can feature outbursts of anger and physical aggression. A better understanding of what drives these symptoms could help inform treatment strategies.

value.title: Amazon launches AWS instances powered by Habana’s AI accelerator chip
value.excerpt: Amazon has launched new AWS instances powered by Habana's Gaudi, a chip that accelerates the training of AI models.

value.title: AI deployments: Is your organization a transformer, pathseeker, starter or underachiever?
value.excerpt: AI-fueled organizations address strategy, operations, culture and change management and ecosystems, according to Deloitte's latest State of AI in the Enterprise report.

value.title: Extend model lineage to include ML features using Amazon SageMaker Feature Store
value.excerpt: Feature engineering is expensive and time-consuming, which may lead you to adopt a feature store for managing features across teams and models. Unfortunately, machine learning (ML) lineage solutions have yet to adapt to this new concept of feature management. To achieve the full benefits of a feature

value.title: Salesforce’s Kathy Baxter and Amazon’s Nashlie Sephus talk keeping AI ethical at Enterprise scale
value.excerpt: AI and big data are an important part of most enterprise-scale companies now, but that very scale can make it difficult to employ them safely and ethically. Kathy Baxter at Salesforce and Nashlie Sephus at AWS have made ethical AI and data collection their business over the last few years,

value.title: Speechmatics pushes forward recognition of accented English
value.excerpt: Speech recognition has gone from convenient to crucial over the last few years as smart speakers and driving assist modes have taken off — but not everyone’s voice is recognized equally well. Speechmatics claims to have the most inclusive and accurate model out there,

value.title: IIT-D to start PG course with focus on AI next yr
value.excerpt: Delhi on Tuesday said that a new postgraduate programme focused on artificial intelligence would be started .

value.title: IBM Announces Advances and New Collaborations in AI-Powered Automation, 5G Connectivity and Security at Mobile World Congress Los Angeles
value.excerpt: Today IBM (NYSE: IBM) announced new collaborations and expanded partner relationships to further the company's capabilities in hybrid cloud, AI, network automation and s (MWC LA). These innovations highlight IBM's role in helping the telecommunications industry evolve as 5G and Edge Computing redefine how business and consumers connect.

value.title: Infrastructure and data issues hamper companies adopting AI, study finds
value.excerpt: More than three-quarters of companies say that they have AI models that never come into use. For 20% of companies, the numbers look even worse, with only 10% of their models making it into production.

value.title: GATC Health Corp chooses Syndi Health to accelerate artificial intelligence training and advance personalized medicine
value.excerpt: Syndi Health and GATC Health Corp today announced they have entered a development agreement, which could accelerate GATC Health's product development and publication release timelines by as much as 50 percent.

value.title: How machine learning speeds up Power BI reports
value.excerpt: Machine learning delivers insights in Power BI reports—and it enables you to get a large amount of data into your reports to generate those insights more quickly.

value.title: How Instoried Is Using AI To Turn Your Content Into Something People Actually Want To Read
value.excerpt: Enter Instoried, which is today announcing the completion of an $8m funding round as it launches its content enhancement platform in the US. Powered by artificial intelligence (AI), Instoried provides instant feedback on the written content created by businesses and individuals,

value.title: ICAIF'21 Showcases How Artificial Intelligence Is Transforming Finance
value.excerpt: ACM, the Association for Computing Machinery, will hold the 2nd ACM International Conference on AI in Finance (ICAIF'21), virtually from November 3-5, 2021. More than 950 people registered for the inaugural conference,

value.title: New VMware CTO Kit Colbert Steers The Company Towards SaaS
value.excerpt: Ranked Industry Analyst Patrick Moorhead dives in as there is a new Chief Technology Officer at VMware. Kit Colbert is thirty days into the role after eighteen years at VMware, where he started as an intern.
